title: The Lost Books of Wizardry
description: Matthew has found three books on wizardry. The young man is in conflict whether he should practice wizardry on good purposes only or discard the three books on the ground the power of wizardry comes from black magic. He is right. The warlock is going to do anything just to kill him because the warlockâ€™s secrets are revealed to him. In the end, it is the good that wins over evil. By the grace of God, the warlock is defeated.
author: Marble Green
